title: Horizon Technology Finance to Announce First Quarter 2022 Financial Results - Yahoo Finance
content: Horizon Technology Finance to Announce First Quarter 2022 Financial Results  Yahoo Finance
description: Horizon Technology Finance Corporation (NASDAQ: HRZN) ("Horizon") (the "Company"), a leading specialty finance company that provides capital in the form of secured loans to venture capital backed companies in the technology, life science, healthcare information and services, and sustainability industries, announced today that it plans to release financial results for the first quarter ended March 31, 2022 on Tuesday, May 3, 2022, after the close of market trading.
